name: Robot Pirates
description: You are a robot pirate, sail the sea, jump the ships and collect as much booty as you can in this fun, frantic & formidable platformer! With randomly generated ships and endless challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or later Processor: 1.00 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 220 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: XP or later Processor: 2.00 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 240 MB available space Sound Card: Any
